sentences.english: He decided to square himself with his wife after their quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 争吵之后，他决定与他的妻子言归于好。

sentences.english: He even reconciled with a classmate with whom he had had trouble several years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至和一位积怨多年的同学言归于好。

sentences.english: They quarrelled but now they're completely reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 他们争吵过，但现在已经完全言归于好了。

sentences.english: Miguel:I think a good friendship deserves a second chance.
sentences.chinese: 我认为深厚的友情应该有言归于好的机会。

sentences.english: He and his wife usually make up their quarrel the same day.
sentences.chinese: 他和妻子吵架通常当天就言归于好。

sentences.english: After quarrelling, the young couple did their best to make it up.
sentences.chinese: 吵过架以后，这对年青夫妇便尽力弥合，言归于好。

sentences.english: What have I done to you? I declare that I am perplexed.
sentences.chinese: 我声明要翻脸了，你得和我言归于好。

sentences.english: Can you make peace with someone after they're dead?
sentences.chinese: 在人死后你就能和他言归于好吗？

sentences.english: I'm glad that the brothers have been brought together after all their quarrels.
sentences.chinese: 我高兴地看到这兄弟俩在争吵之后言归于好了。

sentences.english: B:Do you think they'll patch things up?
sentences.chinese: 你认为他们会言归于好吗？

sentences.english: The best part of fighting is making up afterwards!
sentences.chinese: 吵架最精彩的部分就是过后言归于好。

sentences.english: We decided to patch up our differences and become friends again.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定消除我们之间的分歧，言归于好。

sentences.english: They exchanged angry words before the meeting but were finally persuaded to agree.
sentences.chinese: 他们在会议前争吵起来，经劝说非常后言归于好。

sentences.english: After dinner, I went to his area, hoping to attain it up with him.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后我去了他那里，希望和他言归于好。

sentences.english: Marry and John quarreled, but made up after a while.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽和约翰吵架了，但过了一会儿又言归于好。
